label: SpecifiedLocation
comment: A specified physical location or place.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
Directions, expressed as text, for this specified location.
The code specifying the geopolitical region for this specified location.
The name, expressed as text, of the geopolitical region for this specified location.
The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the map of this specified route.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The code specifying the type of this specified location.

objectProperties.comment: A address specified for this location.
